alert.note: Alert for Ness; Rush (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 6:29PM CDT until June 14 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Ness County in west central Kansas... Central Rush County in central Kansas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Alexander, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... McCracken and Nekoma around 640 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hargrave, Liebenthal and Loretta. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
